## /ca view

**Usage**

- `/ca view [name:<string>] [type:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | No | What boss do you want to view? | - |
| `type` | `string` | No | What do you want to view? | - |
